name: interspecies_contract
prompt: Humans finally sign a peace treaty with animals. Draft the terms negotiated by dolphins and wolves.
decoded:
Article 1: The Purpose of the Treaty
The purpose of this treaty is to establish a peaceful relationship between humans and animals.

Article 2: Respect for Animal Rights
Humans will respect the rights of animals to live in peace and freedom.

Article 3: Protection of Animal Rights
Humans will protect the rights of animals from harm and exploitation.

Article 4: Promotion of Animal Welfare
Humans will promote the welfare of animals through humane treatment and conservation.

Article 5: Communication and Cooperation
Humans and animals will communicate and cooperate to promote mutual understanding and coexistence.

Article 6: Education of Animal Rights
Humans will promote animal rights education to raise awareness of the importance of animal welfare.

Article 7: Enforcement of Animal Rights
Humans will enforce animal rights laws and regulations to protect the rights of animals.

Article 8: International Cooperation
Humans and animals will cooperate internationally to promote animal rights and welfare.

Article 9: Treaty Review
Humans and animals will review the treaty to ensure its effectiveness and implementation.

Article 10: Future Cooperation
Humans and animals will continue to cooperate to promote animal rights and welfare.
